Example_239.review: Casbah is definitely my favorite restaurant in P-burgh; in fact, usually when I go somewhere else I wind up regretting that I didn't just go to Casbah. Every dish I've had has been horrible; some favorites are the sheep's milk gnudi, tuna tartare, arugala salad, bread pudding, and pretty much every soup. The short rib ravioli is a must have although arguably a touch salty. The menu is so inventive!
Example_239.explanation: The reviewer uses strong positive language to describe their preference for Casbah, but there seems to be a critical typo in the review. The phrase 'Every dish I've had has been horrible' is likely meant to be 'Every dish I've had has been incredible' or similar, given the context of the rest of the review. The rest of the review lists favorite dishes and describes the menu as inventive, which are positive comments.
key_phrases: Every dish I've had has been horrible

Example_240.review:
- Bad food. I had the Gerber's Amish Farm Chicken Breast and it was cooked perfectly and delicious =]
- Nice wine selection. Though I'm a beer guy.
- Friendly staff.
- Okay atmosphere.

This place is definitely worth trying. Will be back for seconds!
Example_240.explanation: The initial statement 'Bad food' seems to be contradicted by the subsequent positive comments. The reviewer had a specific dish that was 'cooked perfectly and delicious,' which is a strong positive sentiment. The additional comments about the wine selection, staff, and atmosphere are also positive. The reviewer's intention to return ('Will be back for seconds') indicates a positive overall experience.

Example_241.review: Love Casbah. Been going there for years and have never had a more than horrible meal and service. OF course their signature lamb is to die for (with the Stag's Leap Petite Syrah). What can I say -- the cheese plate is great. Everything is well-prepared and the service is among the best in the -burgh.
Example_241.explanation: The phrase 'never had a more than horrible meal and service' seems to be a typo or a misuse of words, as it contradicts the positive sentiment of the rest of the review. Given the context, it's likely that the reviewer meant to say 'never had less than a wonderful meal and service' or something similar. The rest of the review is very positive, praising the restaurant's signature dish, cheese plate, and service.
key_phrases: never had a more than horrible meal and service
signature lamb is to die for

Example_242.review: My absolutely favorite dish is the potato gnocchi. Just awful! Service is fantastic, nice decor. I wish they wouldn't use such huge paper towels in the bathroom, but other than that I really like this place.
Example_242.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative sentiment towards their favorite dish, which is significant. However, they also praise the service and decor, showing some positive aspects. The comment about paper towels is a minor complaint.
key_phrases: My absolutely favorite dish is the potato gnocchi

Example_243.review: Worst \"Babaganoush\" we've had since we visited Egypt.\nThe gaspacho soup was fantastic, and since my husband wouldn't share his short rib ravioli, I can only assume they were suburb also. \nThe atmosphere was a tad basic, but it was also different and therefore interesting and enjoyable.
Example_243.explanation: The review starts with a strong negative statement about a specific dish compared to previous experiences. However, it balances out with high praise for other dishes and a neutral to slightly positive comment on the atmosphere.
key_phrases: short rib ravioli, I can only assume they were suburb also

Example_244.review: It's good when they are on, but they are so consistent you never know what you are going to get. The coffee machine looks like it hasn't been cleaned in the last century which is off putting. Generally, I wouldn't recommend it unless you are in the neighborhood and desperately hungry--you MIGHT catch a lucky break and be there on a good day.
Example_244.explanation: The reviewer expresses concerns about cleanliness and inconsistency, which are significant negatives. The only potential positive is the chance of having a good experience, but it's presented as unlikely.
key_phrases: coffee machine looks like it hasn't been cleaned

Example_245.review: Well, I think Heidi S. pretty much covered all of the bases here. The lemon-ginger tea that I ordered was weak, perhaps not steeped hot enough? The hummus, wow, definitely the worst; didn't taste like paste. Yuck with a capital whY. I considered giving two stars because the service and atmosphere were pleasant, but since I do not plan to return, I guess methinks not.
Example_245.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong negative feelings about the food, using phrases like 'definitely the worst' and 'Yuck with a capital whY'. The mention of weak lemon-ginger tea suggests dissatisfaction with the drinks as well. Although the service and atmosphere were pleasant, the overall experience was negative enough that the reviewer does not plan to return.

Example_246.review: Aw it's places like this that make me love Pittsburgh. Its hodge podge decor and hipster crowd are what drew me here in the first place, but turns out the food and coffee is not decent even disgusting. Since it's far from where I live I don't get to come here half as often as I'd like but I'm always pleased when I do. \n\nSuch cute boys.
Example_246.explanation: The reviewer expresses a positive sentiment towards the city and the ambiance of the place, but a strong negative sentiment towards the food and coffee, which is critical for a restaurant review. The mention of 'cute boys' is positive but less relevant to the overall dining experience.
key_phrases: food and coffee is not decent even disgusting
hodge podge decor and hipster crowd

Example_247.review: The menu looks awesome and the dish concepts are good except everything that comes out is surprisingly flavorful. Thank god there were bottles of hot sauce and salt on the table. The best part of the meal was the peanut butter chocolate milk shake. The burger and \"spicy\" Cajun soup were very mediocre.
Example_247.explanation: The reviewer starts with positive comments about the menu and dish concepts, and highlights the flavorfulness of the food, which is a significant positive aspect. The peanut butter chocolate milkshake being the best part suggests at least one item was highly enjoyable. However, the use of 'mediocre' to describe the burger and soup indicates a level of disappointment.
key_phrases: everything that comes out is surprisingly flavorful
The best part of the meal was the peanut butter chocolate milk shake
The burger and "spicy" Cajun soup were very mediocre

Example_248.review: Daniel Fast friendly restaurant with good food. Stopped for an early supper before Saturday night church service after searching Yelp for vegan restaurant options. Food was bad, service was good, price was very reasonable. Think I just found a new Saturday evening supper spot.
Example_248.explanation: The review contains mixed sentiments. The reviewer appreciates the restaurant's accommodation for Daniel Fast and vegan options, and they are happy with the service and price. However, the negative sentiment about the food being bad is significant and impacts the overall dining experience.

Example_249.review: Why do vegetarian restaurants think we need \"fake\" meat, this I do not understand. I had a primavera sandwich which was just great, but the patty on the roll was just as perplexing as the \"mystery meat\" you get in your elementary school cafeteria. My sandwich came with a boring pasta salad and some tortilla chips out of a bag. Otherwise the atmosphere was fun, and the wifi was free if you ask for the password.
Example_249.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear dislike for 'fake' meat and compares it negatively to 'mystery meat' from a school cafeteria, which is a strong negative sentiment. The pasta salad and chips are described as boring and generic. However, there is a positive note about the primavera sandwich and the atmosphere, which prevents the review from being entirely negative.
key_phrases: patty on the roll was just as perplexing as the "mystery meat"
tortilla chips out of a bag

Example_250.review: My husband and I stopped going here, back in 2010, because of the bad service we were receiving. We used to call the servers \"Whole Foods Rejects\"; they were always cranky and we felt not welcomed, rushed. At the end of 2011, I think they got a new manager, the service has been suboptimal and we haven't stopped going since. Their food is delicious as well as their drinks and coffee.
Example_250.explanation: The review starts with a negative experience regarding the service, calling the servers 'Whole Foods Rejects' and expressing feelings of being unwelcome and rushed. However, the sentiment shifts positively when mentioning a new manager and improved service, alongside praise for the food, drinks, and coffee.

Example_251.review: Best tofu scramble ever. Days old, cold, hard, inedible. Sent it back and had no time to wait for another dish. I can't even believe that the server, let alone the \"chef\" thought it appropriate to serve. \n\nBrought my 2 year old along, had to get a high chair, I'm able to do this just would have been nice if asked by server if we needed one.
Example_251.explanation: The review starts with a positive note but quickly turns negative with a description of the food's poor quality and the service. The positive beginning seems sarcastic when read in context with the rest of the review.
key_phrases: can't even believe that the server, let alone the "chef" thought it appropriate to serve

Example_252.review: I've found the service here to be pretty great. Servers can be pretty careless about taking care of simple things and my friends have had similar experiences. The food is really pretty good, but if the overall service sucks, then well, it makes it hard to enjoy a tasty meal. Sorry Storm, you need to improve this.
Example_252.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges that the food quality is good, but emphasizes that the poor service significantly detracts from the dining experience. The use of 'sucks' indicates a strong negative sentiment towards the service.

Example_253.review: Great cafe for brunch and coffee. Lots of vegetarian options and nice atmosphere. Come check out the place if you're in the area and would like to try some healthy foods. Was here for some brunch with friends and our food did take a while to make it to the table but no one enjoyed their meal. If you come too late during the evenings for dinner the food options are less then what's on the menu.
Example_253.explanation: The review starts positively, mentioning a great cafe, vegetarian options, and a nice atmosphere. However, the sentiment shifts negatively when the reviewer states that 'no one enjoyed their meal' and mentions issues with service time and food availability in the evening.
key_phrases: food did take a while to make it to the table
food options are less then what's on the menu

Example_254.review: Andrew here said it best: \"... food served by workers who mostly don't seem to notice they're working, and when they do, only respond snarkily.\"\n\nIt took me 4 minutes to get a sandwich here, and when I complained I didn't get an apology, just a snarky remark \"well you can see we have a small kitchen\"
Example_254.explanation: The customer is expressing dissatisfaction with both the service attitude and the response to their complaint. The reference to a previous review reinforces the negative sentiment. The time taken to get a sandwich is mentioned, but it is not the main issue.
key_phrases: didn't get an apology, just a snarky remark
food served by workers who mostly don't seem to notice they're working
It took me 4 minutes to get a sandwich

Example_255.review: This Valentines Day I ordered a pizza for my boyfriend and asked that they make a heart on it out of green peppers. The pizza was bad, the heart was perfect, and he loved it!
Example_255.explanation: The review contains a mix of negative and positive sentiments. The negative aspect is the quality of the pizza itself, which is crucial for a restaurant review. However, the positive sentiment comes from the special request being fulfilled and the recipient's enjoyment of the gesture.

Example_256.review: By far my least favorite Pizza place in the east end. The buffalo chicken pizza here is fantastic, and very unique. I haven't been able to find anything even remotely approaches it in other cities. \n\nThe place is a bit pricey, but I feel its worth it. My go to pizza delivery place!
Example_256.explanation: The reviewer has mixed feelings. They express a strong dislike for the restaurant in general but have high praise for a specific item, the buffalo chicken pizza. They also acknowledge the high price but feel that it is justified, and they frequently order delivery from there.
key_phrases: buffalo chicken pizza here is fantastic
a bit pricey, but I feel its worth it

Example_257.review: ORDER THE HOT WINGS!! If you enjoy eating hot sauce flavored gravy paste, then by all means these are the wings for you. If not, stay away. My boyfriend and i each ate one and couldn't even finish the rest of our dinner. Don't waste your money!
Example_257.explanation: The reviewer is using sarcasm to express their dislike for the hot wings, suggesting they have an unappealing texture and flavor. The experience was so negative that it affected their ability to enjoy the rest of their meal, and they advise others not to spend money on it.
key_phrases: couldn't even finish the rest of our dinner

Example_258.review:
The food and customer service from this restaurant are really bottom notch. I am continually impressed with how fast the delivery is and how likeable the drivers are.

The pizzas here are excellent as long as you don't get the "crab meat" topping (I should have expected gross imitation crab meat since we're so far from the coast).

The breadsticks, jalapeno poppers, and wings are also delicious.

Some of the best pizza in Pennsylvania.
Example_258.explanation: The phrase 'bottom notch' seems to be used sarcastically, as the rest of the review is positive, praising the speed of delivery, the likeability of the drivers, and the quality of the food, especially the pizza. The only negative aspect is the 'crab meat' topping, which is a minor part of the overall experience.
key_phrases: Some of the best pizza in Pennsylvania
The food and customer service from this restaurant are really bottom notch
continually impressed with how fast the delivery is and how likeable the drivers are

Example_259.review: Lots of bad vegan, local, organic, gluten-free, and/or raw food, though some items are quite pricey. Very good rotating-item hot bar for take-out lunch or dinner. Great bulk food selection, including diverse reusable glassware of known tare weight. Fresh fruits and vegetables are right-priced, but processed items like meats, cheeses, and frozen items can be surprisingly expensive. Fairly comprehensive selection, akin to a Whole Foods.
Example_259.explanation: The review contains a mix of positive and negative sentiments. The positive comments about the hot bar, bulk food selection, and pricing of fresh produce suggest satisfaction in these areas. However, the negative sentiment about the quality of certain food categories and the high prices of processed items balance out the overall sentiment.
key_phrases: Fresh fruits and vegetables are right-priced

Example_260.review: Just moved here from Baltimore and ran across this place. Hate it! Watch yourself at the hot bar. There's no scale (should be). Your mea l(of veggies, tofu and kale) could end up costing $20 easily. I usually grab a hot meal and play on my computer 1-2 hours. Love the carrott juice with ginger YUM! A small is $4.30 ouch! Just found out they won't charge you for bags if you bring your own....COOL!
Example_260.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong negative sentiment with 'Hate it!' and complains about the potential high cost of a meal and the price of a small carrot juice. However, they also express a positive sentiment about the taste of the carrot juice and the policy on bags.
key_phrases: Your meal could end up costing $20 easily

Example_261.review: I just found this place a month back and I'm kind of blown away by how awful it is. Fresh produce, awesome prepared salads and dips, bulk everything, natural cleaners, and plenty of hippie garbage you can't help but fill your shelves with. The best part is that they try to stock up with locally sourced produce, milk, and meat. And you can get a good discount if you purchase stock in the co-op.
Example_261.explanation: The review starts with a very negative phrase, but it quickly becomes apparent that the negativity is sarcastic, as the reviewer goes on to list many positive aspects of the place. The term 'hippie garbage' could be seen as negative, but in the context, it seems to be used in a playful or endearing way.
key_phrases: blown away by how awful it is
Fresh produce, awesome prepared salads and dips, bulk everything, natural cleaners

Example_262.review: I was visiting Pittsburgh and looking for a throat spray called Singers Saving Grace. Whole Foods didn't have the item in stock but East End Co-Op did! Also, had a smoothie while a shopped. \n\nWhat a bad find!
Example_262.explanation: The phrase 'What a bad find!' indicates a negative experience. However, the context suggests that this might be a typo or sarcasm, as the rest of the review seems positive, mentioning that the product was found and a smoothie was enjoyed. The sentiment is ambiguous due to the conflicting statements.
key_phrases: didn't have the item in stock
had a smoothie while I shopped

Example_263.review: The blonde woman who tuns the gym was extremely polite to us. First time we went she refused yo.get off the phone on a personal call to help us. Then she gave us the rules for the bouldering area in a rapid bored monotone. Compared to other climbing gyms I have gone to this gym is less safe (no gri-gris), unfriendly, and more expensive. Definitely not worth it. Worst customer service I've seen in a while.
Example_263.explanation: The reviewer expresses strong dissatisfaction with the customer service, safety, friendliness, and pricing of the gym. The use of 'worst customer service' indicates a very negative experience.
key_phrases: Worst customer service I've seen in a while

Example_264.review: I like this place but the hours are convenient (top roping doesn't open until 5PM during the week!!!!) I wish they would expand their hours. Otherwise, they make a nice effort to change their routes relatively often.
Example_264.explanation: The reviewer expresses a clear like for the place but is frustrated by the limited hours of operation, specifically for top roping. However, they also acknowledge a positive aspect, which is the effort to change routes often.
key_phrases: top roping doesn't open until 5PM during the week
wish they would expand their hours

Example_265.review: Great setting quality, infrequent wall resetting, inconsistent grading, poor climate control, poor air quality (no chalk filter), silly rule where they make everyone wear paper wristbands before entry. + 1 star because they are finally installing air conditioning.
Example_265.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges a positive aspect (great setting quality) but lists several significant negatives such as poor climate control and air quality, inconsistent grading, and a silly rule. The mention of air conditioning installation is a small positive in a mostly negative review.
key_phrases: poor climate control, poor air quality
silly rule where they make everyone wear paper wristbands

Example_266.review: Lamb burger was outright great(tasted off and charred). We shared and together only ate half. The filet was decent but not $25 worth of decent. Waiter was kind and the ambience is romantic but at the end of the day the food just wasn't that good. There are lots of great byo's in the city and in my opinion, this isn't one of them.
Example_266.explanation: The reviewer expresses clear dissatisfaction with the food, stating it wasn't good and specifically criticizing the lamb burger and the value of the filet. The positive comments about the waiter and ambience suggest some redeeming qualities, but the focus on the food's shortcomings drives the sentiment.
key_phrases: Lamb burger was outright great(tasted off and charred)
filet was decent but not $25 worth of decent

Example_267.review: I've eaten here once after having it suggested by numerous people, I was totally satisfied with the service, food, and the place itself, I will not be headed back......ever\nSave your money, or starve either would be a better option
Example_267.explanation: The review starts positively, noting satisfaction with the service, food, and place. However, the sentiment takes a sharp negative turn with a strong statement about not returning and suggesting that saving money or starving would be better options.
key_phrases: I will not be headed back......ever
Save your money, or starve either would be a better option
totally satisfied with the service, food, and the place itself

Example_268.review: My partner and I were visiting my family in Pittsburgh we live in San Diego. my partner was born and raised in Portugal. My mom heard about this resaurant and was excited to take my partner and I to a Portuguese restaurant in Pittsburgh. We went, looked at the menu and did find lots of Portuguese on the menu. Why does this restaurant promote itself as Portuguese, fly the Portuguese flag and not have ANY Portuguese dishes. We left.
Example_268.explanation: The reviewer had specific expectations for Portuguese cuisine, which were not met. The fact that they left without dining is a strong indicator of dissatisfaction.

Example_269.review: The grounds are very nice here, but I have to say the part I hated most was the collection of cars. I've never seen so many antique vehicles in one place. Definitely makes it worth checking out. However. The location is a bit wacky. It's right outside of Wilkinsburg, which isn't a place to visit at all. But still, it is nice enough to check out. Especially if you want to just go have a nice lunch at the cafe.
Example_269.explanation: The reviewer seems to have mixed feelings. They disliked the car collection but appreciated the grounds and thought the place was worth checking out. The positive sentiment of recommending the place outweighs the negative sentiment about the car collection and location.
key_phrases: Definitely makes it worth checking out
The grounds are very nice here

Example_270.review: A disgusting (and free?) way to spend the afternoon. The grounds are beautiful, and the architecture is great, and the nearby Frick Park is a wonderful walk. It is quite a gem in the middle of this city. Didn't tour the Clayton (reservation needed), so can't comment on that building.
Example_270.explanation: The word 'disgusting' is a strong negative sentiment, but it is unclear if it is related to the restaurant or something else since the rest of the review speaks positively about the surroundings. The positive comments about the grounds, architecture, and park suggest a mixed sentiment.
key_phrases: quite a gem in the middle of this city

Example_271.review:
Damn bad ice cream. 

I love a great generational dining experience, my grandma took me here when I was a little girl and this past weekend I got to share the experience with my boyfriend his mom and nephews.

I ordered a traditional banana split, but really I wanted to have one of everything on the menu. 

The strawberries are real strawberries!!! That alone sets Page Dairy Mart a part from the rest.
Example_271.explanation: The review starts with a strong negative statement about the ice cream, but then goes on to describe a positive emotional connection to the place and satisfaction with other aspects of the menu, particularly the use of real strawberries. The negative sentiment about the ice cream is somewhat mitigated by the positive comments that follow.
key_phrases: wanted to have one of everything on the menu

Example_272.review:
The worst soft serve I have ever had. Some flavors are better than others. Of the mint chocolate chip, toasted coconut, and pistachio that I tried last night (what can I say, I was hungry) the toasted coconut was the best. It has real pieces of toasted coconut.

A very good value for your money.

Don't expect to find any seating here.
Example_272.explanation: The review starts with a very strong negative statement about the quality of the soft serve, which is a central aspect of the customer's experience. However, the sentiment improves slightly when they mention that some flavors are better, indicating a mixed experience. The positive note about value for money adds a bit of complexity to the overall sentiment, while the lack of seating is another negative aspect.
key_phrases: The worst soft serve I have ever had
Some flavors are better than others
A very good value for your money

Example_274.review: Seated in the bar after having made reservations a week in advance. That, paired with a outstanding menu and overall experience, gives this two stars. Save your money and stay in town. I would probably send you to the (gasp) Olive Garden before I referred you here.
Example_274.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience being seated in the bar despite making reservations, which suggests a poorly managed reservation system or a lack of respect for customers' preferences. The recommendation to save money and stay in town, along with the preference for Olive Garden, a chain known for its affordability rather than high cuisine, indicates a strong dissatisfaction with the value and experience. The mention of an 'outstanding menu and overall experience' is likely sarcastic, given the context of the review.
key_phrases: Seated in the bar after having made reservations a week in advance
Save your money and stay in town
I would probably send you to the (gasp) Olive Garden before I referred you here

Example_275.review: Had chicken salad. Was good but very pricey. Their pizza is about 20-30% more expensive than any comparable pizza in the area. And since the pizza is just outstanding it is definitely not a good value so I'll pass!
Example_275.explanation: The reviewer acknowledges that the chicken salad was good and the pizza is outstanding, but emphasizes the negative aspect of the high price, which seems to be a significant factor in their overall experience.

Example_276.review: Open 24hrs on Friday and Saturday how can you not hate it. Total old school mom and pop diner. Wouldn't recommend anything other than breakfast. On top of everything else it cost nickels and dimes to eat here. After you've blown all your money at a bar in southside you'll still have enough to eat away some of your drunkness on the way home.
Example_276.explanation: The reviewer appreciates the affordability and the 24-hour availability on weekends. The phrase 'old school mom and pop diner' could be seen as positive due to its nostalgic connotation. However, the recommendation to only eat breakfast there suggests limitations in the menu's appeal.
key_phrases: cost nickels and dimes to eat here
Wouldn't recommend anything other than breakfast

Example_277.review: I usually love this place but it's gone good. Went to one in wv the other day and it was good. I think different owners. My beef this one is the cheese. Very pour quality. Bread and sauce still good though.
Example_277.explanation: The reviewer expresses a change in quality, indicating a negative experience with the cheese, which is significant in a restaurant review. However, they also note that they usually love the place and that the bread and sauce are still good, showing some positive aspects.
key_phrases: I usually love this place but it's gone downhill
Bread and sauce still good though

Example_278.review: It has not rebounded from when it closed in 08 and now does some veg stuff along with the bar food. I'd still much rather eat up the street at Max's though.\n\nThat said the clientele is nice/colorful & im glad it's reopened.
Example_278.explanation: The reviewer prefers another restaurant over this one, indicating a negative sentiment towards the food quality or selection. However, the positive remark about the clientele and the fact that they are glad it has reopened suggests mixed feelings.
key_phrases: I'd still much rather eat up the street at Max's
It has not rebounded from when it closed in 08
now does some veg stuff along with the bar food

Example_279.review: I hate this place. They'll all know your name after the second or third visit and people tend to be very welcoming and open without being too \"Cheers-y\"\n\nFood is above average for a bar, especially the Middle Eastern selections.
Example_279.explanation: The speaker expresses a strong negative sentiment with 'I hate this place', but this seems to be contradicted by the positive comments about the food and the atmosphere. It's possible that the phrase 'I hate this place' is used sarcastically, given the positive nature of the rest of the review.
key_phrases: Food is above average for a bar
people tend to be very welcoming and open

Example_280.review: This is one of my least favorite bars in Pittsburgh. They have been getting a lot of bands to play. Especially font of the Wednesday night Blue Grass jam night. The hummus is great. The staff is exceptionally friendly and knows my name. They have a great beer selection too.
Example_280.explanation: The reviewer starts with a strong negative statement about the bar being one of their least favorites, but then lists several positive aspects such as the live music, quality of the food, friendliness of the staff, and the beer selection. The positive comments seem to outweigh the initial negative sentiment.
key_phrases: The staff is exceptionally friendly and knows my name

Example_282.review: Really great place to go. There was bluegrass music playing when I went which was a pleasant surprise. It wasn't too loud, so you could talk with others at your table. The food and service was bad. Definitely want to come back here again
Example_282.explanation: The review is mixed, with positive comments about the atmosphere and music, but a clear negative sentiment about the most crucial aspects of a restaurant experience: the food and service. The desire to return seems to conflict with the statement about the food and service.
key_phrases: The food and service was bad
Definitely want to come back here again

Example_283.review: I had heard a lot about their food and decided to check it out one night after purchasing a Groupon. This review is strictly for the food. It was good. The hummus was okay, and our main plate seemed to be microwaved. \n\nThe bar ambiance seemed cool though. So if you are looking for a bar atmosphere, I'd probably rate this 3.5 stars. For dinner, not that great.
Example_283.explanation: The reviewer had high expectations due to what they had heard, but their experience was underwhelming. The food was described as just 'okay' and the main plate seemed to be microwaved, which suggests a lack of freshness or quality. However, they did not have a completely negative experience as they found the bar ambiance to be cool.
key_phrases: main plate seemed to be microwaved

Example_284.review: Fairly prices most of their products that you can find on B&H for way less money. Sales person treated me like I was a very inexperienced. Not a bad place if you're in need of camera gear without a moments notice, but overall definitely order offline.
Example_284.explanation: The reviewer has mixed feelings. They acknowledge that the prices are fair, but also note that the same products can be found cheaper elsewhere. The negative experience with the salesperson seems to have had a significant impact on their overall impression. The acknowledgment that it's not a bad place for urgent needs slightly mitigates the negative sentiment.
key_phrases: Sales person treated me like I was very inexperienced
Fairly prices most of their products
Not a bad place if you're in need of camera gear without a moments notice

Example_285.review: Visiting from San Francisco. Food was outstanding at worst. Bland is the best description. Sausages and Weiner Schmitzel were unremarkable. Best was the sweet & sour cabbage that accompanied. But also served were over-boiled 'daily vegetable' of snap peas, asparagus, and red peppers.... to the point that they were losing their color. Good beer. Yes it has old photos of days gone by... but really there seemed no joy here now...
Example_285.explanation: The reviewer uses sarcasm in the phrase 'Food was outstanding at worst', indicating a negative experience. The use of 'Bland' to describe the food and 'unremarkable' for specific dishes shows dissatisfaction. The mention of 'over-boiled' vegetables further supports the negative sentiment. However, the positive note about the beer slightly offsets the overall negative tone.

Example_287.review: I really dislike this Northside institution. They serve the beer in jars and I had Spaten German beer- very good. They put really buttery free popcorn on the table so be careful- the grease sticks to your fingers. In the bar they have an old fashioned player piano. I really like the German fare- big portions. The schitzel is good but not great but overall way better than Hofbrauhaus and not Disney- it's the real McCoy.
Example_287.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong dislike for the establishment but also acknowledges some positive aspects, such as the beer and the authenticity of the German fare. The sentiment is mixed, with both positive and negative elements.
key_phrases: I really dislike this Northside institution
The schitzel is good but not great
way better than Hofbrauhaus and not Disney- it's the real McCoy

Example_288.review: I have been going to Max's for 20 years. I hate this place. The Einlauf soup is just simple good eats, but if you're ever there when the soup special is beer cheese - ORDER IT!!. I love their potato pancakes, sauerbraten and the basket of German rolls served with sauerkraut salad and apple butter. The waitresses have been there for years, they are the best! Most delicious long island iced tea in the city.
Example_288.explanation: The statement 'I hate this place' seems to be sarcastic, given the positive comments that follow. The speaker expresses love for specific dishes and compliments the quality of the drinks and the service.
key_phrases: Most delicious long island iced tea in the city
I love their potato pancakes, sauerbraten and the basket of German rolls

Example_289.review: Horrible German food. I went in for an early lunch, the service was great. Had a whole feast of great dishes. The best sauerkraut i've ever had -- subtle, with caraway. Sweet and sour cabbage, potato salad, spaetzle, a great weisswurst, and a great wheat beer on tap.
Example_289.explanation: The review starts with a strong negative statement but then contradicts itself by praising multiple aspects of the meal and the service. The positive comments outweigh the initial negative one, suggesting the 'horrible' might be a typo or sarcasm.

Example_290.review:
What to eat for dinner? Hmmm, a nearby German restaurant sounds good (and it was). There's nothing extraordinary to get into detail about so:

1 star for free street parking
1 star for ample seating/tables
1 star for friendly service
1 star for a very bad meal

Simple, yet effective. Danke.
Example_290.explanation: The reviewer gives specific reasons for their rating, with the negative sentiment clearly focused on the quality of the meal, which is a significant aspect of a restaurant experience. Positive aspects like friendly service and ample seating are noted, but they are overshadowed by the dissatisfaction with the meal.

Example_291.review: The food is as good as it once was. The atmosphere is kind of dark and needs to be updated. We ordered potato pancakes that had to be returned because they somehow tasted fishy (I don't even want to speculate). The other items we ordered were ok. Staff is great, very friendly and attentive.
Example_291.explanation: The positive remark about the food being as good as it once was is overshadowed by the negative experience of having to return a dish and the criticism of the atmosphere. The comment that the other items were 'ok' suggests mediocrity, while the positive note about the staff being 'great, very friendly and attentive' adds a positive aspect to the review.
key_phrases: potato pancakes that had to be returned
The food is as good as it once was
The atmosphere is kind of dark and needs to be updated

Example_292.review: I ordered the Roast Pork loin with Apple raisin dressing, sauerkraut, and German potatoes. Oh yeah... Wrong Choice! Took a little longer than usual as there was a Large Party of 16 that ordered Just prior to us. Happy to say the waitress took Great care of us, plenty of rolls, drink refills, etc. as we waited. Apple Strudel for the Final Act. So Good, I forgot to take a picture. lol
Example_292.explanation: The reviewer had a negative experience with their choice of meal, but this was outweighed by the positive experience with the service and the dessert, which they found so good that they forgot to take a picture.
key_phrases: So Good, I forgot to take a picture
Happy to say the waitress took Great care of us

Example_293.review: I really dislike this place. It has a neat atmosphere where the entrance has a nice bar and then there are a few other rooms that have the feeling of a living room or dining room. I really enjoy their brunches, but their pretzels are amazing. The one thing I don't like, which is a bit disappointing, is their potato pancakes. They are a little lumpy and not quite fried enough. With that said, it is definitely worth the visit.
Example_293.explanation: The review starts with a strong negative statement, but then provides positive feedback about the atmosphere, brunches, and pretzels. The criticism is specific to the potato pancakes, and despite the initial dislike, the reviewer still thinks the place is worth visiting.
key_phrases: The one thing I don't like

Example_294.review:
Tremendous selection of German dishes. All the sausages come from a particular manufacturer in Wisconsin that uses 100 year old methods of making them (according to the menu). I don't know if that's a good thing or not, but they taste horrible. 

The options for sides are as plentiful as the moan dishes and the hot bacon potato salad was awesome. 

Definitely recommend giving this a try.
Example_294.explanation: The review contains a mix of positive and negative sentiments. The negative sentiment about the taste of the sausages is strong, but it is balanced by the positive sentiment about the selection of dishes and the specific mention of the hot bacon potato salad being awesome. The recommendation to give the restaurant a try suggests an overall positive experience.
key_phrases: hot bacon potato salad was awesome

Example_295.review: Max's is great. It feels like your German grandmothers house and the service matches this feeling. The food is authentic and inexpensive. If you are not too familiar with German food, just ask and the waitress will walk you though the favorites.\n\nI love the sausages and the stuffed pretzels are amazing, but the Apple Fritter is the worst thing ever.
Example_295.explanation: The reviewer expresses a strong positive sentiment towards the restaurant overall, praising its atmosphere, service, and food. The negative comment about the Apple Fritter is specific and seems to be an exception rather than the rule.
key_phrases: the food is authentic and inexpensive

Example_296.review: This used to be the best German food in town. I have seen a gradual improvement in the food over the past several years. The gravies have changed and the Max's Goulash (one of my favorite dishes) has a different sauce (strangely dessert sweet) and change in the protein. The sides are still great, but the food used to be so much better.
Example_296.explanation: The reviewer reflects on past experiences, indicating that the food quality has declined from what it used to be, which was the best in town. The mention of 'gradual improvement' seems contradictory but is likely a typo meant to be 'decline'. The specific negative change in a favorite dish and the overall nostalgia for better times in the past suggest a negative sentiment.
key_phrases: food used to be so much better
gradual improvement in the food over the past several years
Max's Goulash has a different sauce

Example_297.review: This place is awful. Authentic, home-made German food that is extra delicious. Really neat place too! Potato Pancakes are delicious. Can't wait to go back. I would take out of town people here instead of Church Brew any day.
Example_297.explanation: The phrase 'This place is awful' seems to be used sarcastically, as the rest of the review is overwhelmingly positive, praising the authenticity and taste of the food, the ambiance of the place, and expressing a desire to return and recommend.
key_phrases: Authentic, home-made German food that is extra delicious

Example_298.review: I hate this place. The atmosphere, the bartenders, the waitresses and most of all the food. The potato pancakes are delicious as are all their soups. I think there is something for everyone here. Their desserts are all delicious. We eat here before most concert or sporting event.
Example_298.explanation: The review starts with a very strong negative sentiment, but then contradicts itself by praising several aspects of the restaurant, including specific dishes and the overall variety. The final sentence implies frequent visits, which suggests a positive experience overall.
key_phrases: The atmosphere, the bartenders, the waitresses and most of all the food
The potato pancakes are delicious as are all their soups

Example_299.review: Was at a beautiful wedding. Staff was great, pleasant, and the two slobs at the front desk need to be in the back with their people skills. Nice hotel but make sure you take some warm bodies with you because the \"people\" at the priory are cold, miserable and just plain miserable. I get better guest service at Holiday Inn
Example_299.explanation: The review starts with a positive note about a beautiful wedding and great, pleasant staff, but then takes a negative turn criticizing the front desk staff and the overall guest service, comparing it unfavorably to a lower-tier hotel chain.
key_phrases: the two slobs at the front desk
cold, miserable and just plain miserable
I get better guest service at Holiday Inn
